alert.note: Alert for Western Clay; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 7:31PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Putnam and south central Clay Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 731 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Florahome, or 7 miles northeast of Interlachen, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bardin, Hollister, George`s Lake, Florahome, Carraway and Mannville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
